alert.note: Alert for Ector; Midland (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 6:25PM CDT until May 24 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Midland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Ector County in western Texas... Central Midland County in western Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Midland International Air and Space Port, or 7 miles northeast of Odessa, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Midland, Odessa, Greenwood, Midland International Air and Space Port, Cotton Flat, Warfield and Skywest Airport. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 121 and 131, and between mile markers 137 and 143. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
